response.overview: The four masters and apprentices came to Tianzhu and accidentally found the real princess of Tianzhu, which broke the marriage between Zhu Bajie and Yutu. However, when several people were struggling with whether to complete the jade rabbit and the eight Precepts. Another monster appeared, disturbing the four masters and disciples' trip to take Stems. Finally, with the help of Chang'e and Tai Shang Laojun, the monster was subdued, and Princess Tianzh u returned to normal life, but Wukong silently put away the emotions in his heart. In the end, the four Tang monks and disciples embarked on the road of taking scriptures.
response.title: True and False Princess
